system:
note description: "Action sequences for EV_RICH_TEXT_I." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "event, action, sequence" date: "$Date: 2016-09-27 08:50:48 -0700 (Tue, 27 Sep 2016) $" revision: "$Revision: 99192 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xmlEV_RICH_TEXT_ACTION_SEQUENCES_I
feature -- Event handling
f_caret_move_actions../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_caret_move_actionscaret_move_actions: ../interface/ev_integer_action_sequence.xmlEV_INTEGER_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed when caret position changes. do if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_caret_move_actions_internalcaret_move_actions_internal as l_result then Result := l_result else create Result ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_caret_move_actions_internalcaret_move_actions_internal := Result end ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
f_selection_change_actions../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_selection_change_actionsselection_change_actions: ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed when selection changes. do if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_selection_change_actions_internalselection_change_actions_internal as l_result then Result := l_result else create Result ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_selection_change_actions_internalselection_change_actions_internal := Result end ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
f_file_access_actions../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_file_access_actionsfile_access_actions: ../interface/ev_integer_action_sequence.xmlEV_INTEGER_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Actions to be performed while loading or saving. -- Event data is percentage of file written (0-100). do if attached ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_file_access_actions_internalfile_access_actions_internal as l_result then Result := l_result else create Result ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_file_access_actions_internalfile_access_actions_internal := Result end ensure not_void: Result /= Void end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_caret_move_actions_internal../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_caret_move_actions_internalcaret_move_actions_internal: detachable ../interface/ev_integer_action_sequence.xmlEV_INTEGER_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Implementation of once per object ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_caret_move_actionscaret_move_actions. note option: stable attribute end
f_selection_change_actions_internal../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_selection_change_actions_internalselection_change_actions_internal: detachable ../interface/ev_notify_action_sequence.xmlEV_NOTIFY_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Implementation of once per object ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_selection_change_actionsselection_change_actions. note option: stable attribute end
feature {../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I, ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_buffering_structures_i.xmlEV_RICH_TEXT_BUFFERING_STRUCTURES_I}
f_file_access_actions_internal../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_file_access_actions_internalfile_access_actions_internal: detachable ../interface/ev_integer_action_sequence.xmlEV_INTEGER_ACTION_SEQUENCE -- Implementation of once per object ../implementation_interface/ev_rich_text_action_sequences_i.xml#f_file_access_actionsfile_access_actions. note option: stable attribute end
